act.title: Dialogue Reconstruction
act.intro: Put the sentences below in the correct order. (They are jumbled randomly and appear in a different order everytime you attemp the activity)

item.hanzi: 听说王府井很热闹，我们去那里看看吧。
item.pinyin: Tīngshuō Wángfǔjǐng hěn rènao, wǒmen qù nàlǐ kàn kan ba.

item.hanzi: 好啊，你知道该怎么走吗？
item.pinyin: Hǎo a, nǐ zhīdào gāi zěnme zǒu ma?

item.hanzi: 不清楚，我只知道王府井在北京饭店旁边。
item.pinyin: Bù qīngchǔ, wǒ zhǐ zhīdào Wángfǔjǐng zài Běijīng fàndiàn pángbiān.
Hǎo de, dǎdī guòqù yě bù guì.
